package.name: svn
package.summary: PHP Bindings for the Subversion Revision control system.
package.description:
Bindings for libsvn,
for more details, have a look at the examples, or google for FlexySvn
package.notes: - Fix bug #11153 - svn diff uses utf8 paths - Fix bug #11157 - missing constants needed for svn_status - Rewrite configure script to find APR and its compile flags - Add support for svn_info() - patch by Marco Tabini - Add support for svn_export() - patch by Scott MacVicar - Add support for svn_copy() and svn_switch() - patch by Conny Dahlgren - Add support for svn_blame() / svn_revert() - patch by Jerome Renard - Add support for limiting results with svn_log() - patch by Edward Z. Yang - Add support for limiting svn_checkout() - patch by Devlar - Add constants for use as parameters to svn_cat() - patch by Devlar - Add an OO interface to the extension - patch by Devlar

configureoption.name: with-svn
configureoption.prompt: Please provide the prefix of Subversion installation

configureoption.name: with-svn-apr
configureoption.prompt: Please provide the prefix of the APR installation used with Subversion

release.notes:
- Compiles on Win32 + Netware (Thanks to Guenter Knauf) - dependancy on svn-config removed (as recommended by Subversion developers) - Pretty complete implementation.
Bugs #6893 - correct types for strict compilers
Known issues: There are bug reports about commit / checkout functionality. Any help reproducing and fixing these is welcome.
